Rsync for HPUX

  1. Login to pgnmsv01 and copy the packages to the target server
    sudo scp -r /prod/images/hpux/rsync/ <hostname>:/var/tmp/
  2. Login to the target and install the dependencies and rsync.
    sudo swinstall sudo swinstall -s /var/tmp/popt-1.16-ia64-11.31.depot popt\
sudo swinstall -s /var/tmp/rsync-3.1.0-ia64-11.31.depot rsync
  3. Setup a soft link in /usr/bin
    sudo ln -s /usr/local/bin/rsync /usr/bin/rsync
